text: Marco's Pizza, operated under Marco's Franchising, is an American restaurant chain and interstate franchise. It is based in Toledo, Ohio. It does Italian- American cuisine. As of mid-2017, there are more than 800 franchised Marco's Pizza eateries in 34 U.S. states, India and Puerto Rico. In 2016 Marco's Pizza was ranked number ten under the Pizza Today list of the Top 100 Pizza Companies of the United States. The company was founded in 1978 in Oregon, Ohio, which is a suburb of Toledo. ==References== Category:American fast food restaurants Category:1978 establishments in the United States Category:Companies based in Ohio
title: Marco's Pizza
